extendedInfo.description: The Research Park Mobile Application provides you with latest news about the research park at University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. In this application, you will be able to find the latest news, events and job listings in the research park. This application provides you with everything you need to know about the research park right at your fingertips (literally), including information about the companies in the research park, EnterpriseWorks services, maps, directories and more.

reviews.title: Awesome app!!!
reviews.comment: This is the best app that I have ever seen in a college setting. It\'s really very useful ! The service description text do need some line breaks though. Hahaha.
reviews.author: A Google User
